alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 4:53AM PST until February 23 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands, San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands and Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Areas of blowing dust reducing visibility are expected in and near agricultural areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands
